articles.title: Scientists Discover a Cheaper, More Powerful Catalyst for Clean Hydrogen Energy - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Scientists used a nanoparticle “megalibrary” to uncover a low-cost, high-performing alternative to iridium, unlocking a faster path to affordable hydrogen energy.
articles.content:
An artistic interpretation of the new catalytic material performing a reaction to split water. Credit: Jin Huang and Siyuan Zuo
